attributes.action: donate the entire fee from his memoirs to charity.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: This would set a wonderful precedent for future Prime Ministers and, I believe, receive a very positive response from the public in the same way that the footballer Niall Quinn's decision to donate the fee from his testimonial match did.

reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
